Title: Turn China into a prosperous, rich and powerful industrialized socialist country under the leadership of the Communist Party and Chairman Mao!
Designer: Ding Hao (丁浩)Zhao Yannian (赵延年)Cai Zhenhua (蔡振华)
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: Zhao Yannian drew Mao, Cai Zhenhua the fruits and vegetables in the foreground, and Ding Hao the background with industrial plants.
